products.metadescription: Oh goodness, not another beige I hear you say. That is exactly what I said when I was told to write a unique description for the Cream Velux replacement blind, but fear not, this is a lovely cream shade that is perfect for adding some contrast to your

products.title: Luna Blackout Cream - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Luna Blackout Cream - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Cream. Made to measure from £19.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Luna Blackout roof blinds come in 8 colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. 
 
This fabric has an acrylic coating backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product ID: DB-SRB0042 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Acrylic coated white backing Headrail: 53mm Deep Cassette & 30mm Wide Side Channels     Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Skye Grace Ivory (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Skye Grace Ivory (Blackout) Velux Windows 1992-2001 from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Windows 1992-2001 online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Splash Oyster - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Splash Oyster - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Cream. Made to measure from £34.52 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Splash Oyster Light Filtering Skylight blind is a very light, natural cream colour perfect for a skylight window.  This neutral tone will work well in most spaces. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour.  Our Skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows.  As with all our made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind. 
 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-SRB0040 Fabric Colour: Oyster     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Ribbons Solar Cream Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Ribbons Solar Cream Pleated Skylight Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £40.94 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Ribbons Solar, a very affordable and quality blinds perfect for any home, there are many beautiful colours to choose from.  Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer.  A perfect thermal fabric.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0129 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Infusion Solar Ivory Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Infusion Solar Ivory Pleated Skylight Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £40.94 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our range of Infusion Solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a Venetian or roller blind. The Solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays.    
 The Infusion Solar Ivory pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0016 Fabric Colour: Ivory Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Delightful Cream (1258)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Delightful Cream (1258) Velux Pleated Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Pleated Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Elegant, decorative lighting effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Slim, elegant side rails and top case.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	20 different colours and designs.

products.title: Delicious Cream (6503)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Delicious Cream (6503) Velux Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the Roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice!

 	Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Interchangeable fabrics.
 	Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.
 	No visible cords ensures child safety.
 	Installs in minutes.
